full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BSRUNG THUGS BRGYUD BSKUL BA'I SGRA DBYANGS GA-YANG 'BOD RIN CHEN CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
